text: Teen Mom 2 ’ s Javi Marroquin celebrated son Lincoln ’ s birthday on Saturday, November 18, and he did it with help from his costarBriana DeJesus. The Air Force member, 24, posted a photo of the reality stars posing in front of a birthday cake with their children. He captioned it, “ Thank you friends and family that came and made Lincoln ’ s birthday extremely special. Huge thank you to my girl @ _ brianadejesus helping me put this together and thank you @ miss _ teenyfabsmama for these awesome shirts. Linc loved them. ” Marroquin shares 4 - year - old Lincoln with ex - wife Kailyn Lowry, while Briana shares daughters Nova, 6, with Devoin Austin, and 5 - month
